announcements.title: GoatHacks 2023
announcements.body: The first, and so far only, update: Elemental Chess was created at GoatHacks 2023! I hope everyone had a great time at the event-- for me, it was a lot of fiddly work to make the website, but I plan to reuse this for a later project, so it was worth it. Overall, I'd say it went well!
